title: If there is no data for series, a friendly error message should be displayed
OB: When there is no data available for the series, no error message is displayed.
EB: When there is no data for the series, a friendly error message should pop up to inform the user.
SR: 1. Open the application. 2. Navigate to the series section. 3. Check if the series contains any data. 4. If there is no data, verify that a friendly error message is displayed to remind the user.
